item.title: Hugo主题框架介绍「1」
item.description: 文章中的cover图片和引用图片的位置放在哪？ collections: name: ‘post’ label: ‘Post’ folder: ‘content/posts’ create: true slug: ‘{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}-{{slug}}’ name: ‘about’ label: ‘About’ folder: ‘content/about’ create: true slug: ‘{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}-{{slug}}’ [collections] [[collections.post]] label= ‘Post’ folder= ‘content/posts’ create= true slug= ‘{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}-{{slug}}’ [[collections.about]] label= 'About' folder= 'content/about' create= true slug= '{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}-{{slug}}' To use it, create an admin folder
